items.title: EMA OKs Oral Treatment for Postnatal Depression
items.description: The pill can reduce symptoms within 2 weeks' treatment. Medscape Medical News

items.title: EMA Launches Review of Tecovirimat Effectiveness for Mpox
items.description: Preliminary data from clinical trials of tecovirimat as a treatment for mpox virus infection have given disappointing results, prompting an EMA review...

items.title: EMA Says No to Duchenne Gene Therapy Elevidys
items.description: The European drug authority recommends refusal of marketing authorization after study shows no benefit over placebo. Medscape Medical News

items.title: Nursing Course Applications Hit Record Low, UCAS Reveals
items.description: Nursing course applications in the UK have fallen 30% since 2021, prompting urgent calls for action to prevent further NHS workforce shortages. Medsca...

items.title: EMA Recommends Aqneursa for Niemann-Pick Type C Disease
items.description: The drug treats the neurologic manifestations of the condition in adults and children. Medscape Medical News
